biospec_descr.textblock:
The participants were invited to local community health center before 8:00 am after 8-hour
      fasting overnight. Firstly, each participant provided 10 ml spot urine samples. Then, 5 ml
      venous blood was collected using vacuum blood collection tube.

brief_summary.textblock:
1. acquire the environmental iodine status of Hangzhou

        2. acquire the iodine status of population in Hangzhou

        3. acquire the prevalence of thyroid diseases in Hangzhou

        4. explore the association between iodized salt and thyroid disease

clinical_study.brief_title: the Effect of Universal Salt Iodization on Thyroid Diseases

study_pop.textblock:
This study was conducted in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province, China, which locates at east of
        China. This city covers eight districts and five counties. There are 8.7 millions
        residents in Hangzhou city; 73.25% of them living in urban areas, 26.75% in rural areas.
        This study was designed to be representative of the civilian from Hangzhou and collected
        information on demographic characteristics, health status, iodine intake and thyroid
        disease.

facility.name: Hangzhou Center of Disease Control and Prevention

overall_official.affiliation: Hangzhou Center for Disease Control and Prevention, Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China

authority: the Ministry of Science and Technology (Grant number: 2011CB503706);
the National Key Technology R&D Program of China (Grant number: 2011CB503706)

primary_outcome.description: An ultrasound examination of the thyroid was performed to detect thyroid nodules, using a Sonoline Versa Pro (Siemens, Munich, Germany) with a 7.5-MHz, 70-mm linear transducer (effective length, 62 mm).

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Hangzhou Center of Disease Control and Prevention
responsible_party.investigator_title: Superintendent of Department of Endemic Diseases Control and Prevention,Hangzhou Center for Disease Control and Prevention, Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China

clinical_study.source: Hangzhou Center of Disease Control and Prevention
clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Ecologic or Community, Time Perspective: Cross-Sectional
